Package org.cesecore.certificates.certificate

Class NoConflictCertificateStoreSessionBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cesecore.certificates.certificate.NoConflictCertificateStoreSessionBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NoConflictCertificateStoreSession, NoConflictCertificateStoreSessionLocal, NoConflictCertificateStoreSessionRemote
    public class NoConflictCertificateStoreSessionBean
extends Object
implements NoConflictCertificateStoreSessionRemote, NoConflictCertificateStoreSessionLocal
    These methods call CertificateStoreSession for certificates that are plain CertificateData entities. See CertificateStoreSession for method descriptions.

    For NoConflictCertificateData the methods perform additional logic to check that it gets the most recent entry if there's more than one (taking permanent revocations into account), and for updates it appends new entries instead of updating existing ones.

    Version:
    $Id: NoConflictCertificateStoreSessionBean.java 29433 2018-07-02 16:55:26Z mikekushner $

        Parameters:
        issuerDN - Subject DN of CA.
        Returns:

      • generateDummyFingerprint

        public String generateDummyFingerprint​(String issuerdn,
                                       BigInteger certserno)
        Description copied from interface: NoConflictCertificateStoreSession
        EJBCA expects all certificate entities to have a fingerprint. This method generates a dummy fingerprint, to be used in NoConflictCertificateData and for associated publisher queue entries.
        Specified by:
        generateDummyFingerprint in interface NoConflictCertificateStoreSession
        Parameters:
        issuerdn - issuer DN of the desired certificate.
        certserno - serial number of the desired certificate!
        Returns:
        Hex encoded fingerprint. It is unique per issuerdn/serial.
